John_1_1: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
John_1_2: He was in the beginning with God.
John_1_3: All things came into being through Him, and apart from Him not one thing came into being which has come into being.
Ephesians_3_17: That Christ may make His home in your hearts through faith, that you, being rooted and grounded in love,
Ephesians_3_18: May be full of strength to apprehend with all the saints what the breadth and length and height and depth are
Ephesians_3_19: And to know the knowledge-surpassing love of Christ, that you may be filled unto all the fullness of God.
